name: 🌱🧶 Carbon Credit NFT 🧶=Clean🌱
description:
I offer 1.000 items for sale. When all is sold, I will compensate for the ecological footprint of the buyers by buying carbon credits equivalent to 10 tonnes of CO2. By purchasing a green Carbon Credit NFT you can contribute to save the Amazon rainforest. The validated platform is provided by the world's leading carbon offsetting company Moss.earth @MCo2token. 🐾 Details: Seamless loop rendered by Blender/Eevee 1080x1080/25fps with my own music.
